caller_intent: Mary Nichols is seeking clarification on why her auto insurance premium with Travelers increased for the January renewal period.
resolution_steps: Agent Brandy verifies Mary's mailing address to confirm her policy details.
Brandy confirms Mary's policy is with Travelers, covering a 2006 Ford Explorer with liability-only coverage.
Brandy explains she needs to investigate the premium increase by accessing Travelers' system.
Mary requests a callback, and Brandy agrees to contact her before 4:30 PM (considering her MRI appointment).
knowledge_required: Accessing carrier systems (Travelers) to review policy details and premium changes
Understanding auto insurance policy structures (liability-only coverage)
Handling customer inquiries about premium increases
summary: Mary Nichols contacted Alliance Insurance Services to inquire about a January auto insurance premium increase with Travelers. Agent Brandy confirmed policy details and agreed to investigate the increase by accessing Travelers' system, with a commitment to callback before 4:30 PM (accounting for Mary's MRI appointment). The issue remains unresolved but is being actively addressed.
